summary: Tokyo Skytree is a super tall tower in Tokyo, Japan. Standing at 634 meters (2,080 feet), it's the tallest tower globally and the third-tallest structure, beaten only by two skyscrapers. It's used for broadcasting TV and radio signals, replacing the older Tokyo Tower. The tower opened in 2012 and is part of a big commercial area with a train station and an aquarium nearby. It's a popular spot for tourists to enjoy the city's views.
title: Tokyo Skytree
